extendedInfo.description: Protection for Your Data and Your Mobile AdventuresESET Mobile Security excels with 99.7% detection rate (source: AV-TEST May/June 2013)Enjoy your time online, social networking or shopping, protected by ESET technology that has been successfully protecting customers for a record breaking 10 consecutive years  (source: Virus Bulletin, VB100 Awards).ESET's technology lets you stay secure and in control of your phone and personal data no matter what â even if your device goes missing. Core security features are free, go Premium to benefit from the full potential of ESET Mobile Security.Keeping You Safely Connected with Antivirus Protectionâ¢ All apps are screened for malware in real time.â¢ Cloud technology ESET Live Grid provides maximum protection against emerging threats. â¢ Detection of Potentially Unwanted Apps - Uncover apps that do harm by sending text messages or make calls to premium rate numbers.Anti-Theft*: Locate and Control Your Missing Phone Remotelyâ¢ Remotely locate and lock your stolen device or make it play a siren. â¢ Easily set up of Anti-Theft with step-by-step guide to your security options. â¢ Uninstall Protection - Keeping you in control, one password prevents unwanted removal, and the appâs security settings. Tablet & landscape friendly - Regardless the screen size or orientation of your device, ESET Mobile Security responds quickly to the tap of your finger.GO PREMIUM AND TAKE ADVANTAGE OF EXTRA FEATURES!Premium Anti-Theft Features+ Remote Wipe - Safely delete all your contacts, messages and removable memory cards with a simple SMS command. + SIM Guard - Your device will be able to receive remote commands even if an unauthorized SIM card is inserted. Your pre-defined contact(s) can receive the inserted SIMâs phone number, IMSI and the deviceâs IMEI code.Premium Security Features+ Protect your personal informationlike usernames, passwords, banking information or credit card details with Anti-Phishing+ Apps Audit - See the permissions of your apps and know the information on your device they access.+ Device Monitoring - View the overall security status of your device and check for turned on data or call roaming, the Wi-Fi you are connected to, or the available memory.Premium SMS&Call Filter Features*+ Control calls and SMS by setting time based rules for incoming and outgoing can be limited to specific times, while allowing exceptions for family and friends. + Groups Blocking - Blocks calls or SMS from a specific user, user group, or hidden numbers.+ Block Last Caller - Block the last caller and prevent future calls from this number. Become partÂ´of our community Engage with ESET on Facebook https://www.facebook.com/esetsoftwareGet the latest news to your feed with ESET on Twitter https://twitter.com/ESET+1 ESET on Google+ http://www.gplus.to/esetWatch ESET on YouTube http://www.youtube.com/user/esetglobalPost on ESET Security Forum http://forum.eset.comBe informed about latest Android discoverieshttp://www.welivesecurity.com/category/android-2/Ask a question if something is not clearhttp://kb.eset.com/esetkb/index?page=home&segment=home*Anti-Theft and SMS&Call Filter functionality supports only cell enabled devices

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: I feel better know eset is on my phone. I know it\'s protected, and the remote lock and wipe functions are awesome.
reviews.author: Daniel Esquerra

reviews.title: First Class Application
reviews.comment: Unparalleled functionality in a beautifully presented interface. Very impressive and highly recommended.
reviews.author: John Palmer

reviews.title: Very good
reviews.comment: Very good antivirus. Work excellent, all time running but do not slows system. Hopefully give correct level protect.
reviews.author: Szymon W\303\263jcik

reviews.title: A great tool that protect my device.
reviews.comment: A great smart security to my device that protect my device every time I install virus infected apps. But many functions blocked due to payment.
reviews.author: Abdul Hameed

reviews.title: Using Trial, Will Likely Buy Premium Version
reviews.comment: Doesn\'t appear to interfere with other processes, right-on-the-money scanning for downloads, easy to use and understand. Have also been using avast! on my Samsung Galaxy S III but the interface with Eset is much more user friendly and intuitive.
reviews.author: Chris Putt

reviews.title: So far, extremely impressed...
reviews.comment: ... but I would like to see certified applications on the lines of that provided by TrustGo. This is a polished app and the only one of its kind that looks great on my Galaxy Tab 10.1. Well done, developers.
reviews.author: John P Coates

reviews.title: Expectations Met
reviews.comment: Eset Mobile Security is the number one, best of its kind, and must have protection app for your smart phone. Replicating what they have done on standard computer protection and service, i wouldnt use a mobile device without it!
reviews.author: Ryan Swenson

reviews.title: Excellent AV product
reviews.comment: Excellent antivirus product as always from ESET.  The reason that im not going to buy the Premium version is the One Year ONLY licence. It should be one time fee -end of story.
reviews.author: demetris gerasimou

reviews.title: I am satisfied
reviews.comment: I was satisfied with previous version as well. What I like on this at first glance is the simplified graphics more suitable for nowadays smartphones. I\'ve never had problems with this AV on PC as well as on my smartphone. Well done.
reviews.author: Branislav Osif

reviews.title: battery hog, casio commando gz one 4g LTE
reviews.comment: eats the battery like crazy, lookout mobile security doesn\'t
reviews.author: keith kopac

reviews.title: Great mobile protection
reviews.comment: I like it!  I use norton for my pc & mobile. But I think your app is better! I hope i can have it.
reviews.author: JUN NAZARENO Sioco

reviews.title: Great protection
reviews.comment: Quick, accurate & safe. Set is an awesome company. Have their system on my pc, too!
reviews.author: Happy Grits

reviews.title: Great as always.
reviews.comment: The best of the best, and I\'ve been using this antivirus since Windows XP. But i kinda agree with others. The license should be lifetime and not one year only. Please consider this.
reviews.author: Arya Putra

reviews.title: Country name wrong!
reviews.comment: My country\'s name should be Nepal not \"nepa\" please fix
reviews.author: Satish Dongol

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: Nice app, i use eset smart security on pc. It\'s good to have one such app!
reviews.author: vladcasillias

reviews.title: Best there is!
reviews.comment: I have Nod32 on all my PC\'s and now it\'s on my Galaxy S4 and works just as well
reviews.author: Geoffrey Tanner

reviews.title: Nice!
reviews.comment: So far so good. Wish the other parts of the app were free...like some of the competition offers.
reviews.author: Dan Person

reviews.title: Works Great!
reviews.comment: It\'s the best mobile anti virus software I\'ve ever used. Of course I have the paid version demo, Idk what the free version will work like
reviews.author: Neil Nachtwey

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: Plus, comes in Romanian language too :D More secure than AVG, which can be deleted without a password (!!!), but less secure than BitDefender, which is an advanced security solution... And it\'s less expensive.
reviews.author: Catalin Deluxus

reviews.title: Samsung galaxy note2
reviews.comment: Best on the market works well previously used AVG this app is way better.
reviews.author: Richard Asher
